gamemodels

类 PlayerModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • gamemodels.PlayerModel
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PlayerModel
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is class for defining player. A player belongs to a RiskGame object, has amount of armies, can own several countries.
    另请参阅:
